TestCaseMetaData.name: final_amended
TestCaseMetaData.Description: The laboratory at Century Hospital, 2070 Test Park, Los Angeles, CA 90067 received a blood specimen from Dr. Radon's office on patient Willow C. Jones for a complete blood count (CBC) test. The patient was identified in the system as a 14 year old white female. The blood specimen was analyzed and the final result revealed high WBC, particularly Lymphocytes and Neutrophils as well as high hematocrit, MCV and MCH. The final test result report was generated by the LIS and transmitted to the patient's record in the ambulatory EHR used in Dr. Radon's office.
TestCaseMetaData.PreCondition: Patient information is pre-loaded in the EHR-S. No other Pre-Condition.
TestCaseMetaData.PostCondition: The test message information received by the EHR-S has been incorporated with the patient's record.
TestCaseMetaData.TestObjectives: Demonstrate the capability of the EHR to import and incorporate a final valid LRI CBC panel result message
TestCaseMetaData.Notes: This test case requires display verification only.
TestCaseMetaData.Comments: This test case is evaluating the proper use of OBR-22 to establish chronological order of reports and correct use of the status codes in OBR-25 and OBX-11.
